label: TransportEvent
comment: A significant occurrence or happening during transport.,A referenced significant occurrence or happening during transport.

datatypeProperties.comment: The date, time, date time or other date time value of the actual arrival related to this transport event.
The date, time, date time or other date time value of the actual departure related to this transport event.
The actual date, time, date time, or other date time value of the occurrence of this transport event.
The actual period of time during which this transport event occurred.
A note providing additional security measures applicable to this transport event.
A textual description of an anchorage for this transport event.
The indication of whether or not this anchorage transport event is or was expected.
A note providing information applicable to this piece of logistics transport equipment.
An arrival date, time, date time, or other date time value related to this transport event.
A geographical feature associated with this communication event.
The location of a cargo facility related to this transport event.
A certifying party for this transport event.
A location of a conveyance facility related to this transport event.
A specified period of time during which this transport event is delayed.
A delay specified for this referenced transport event.
A departure date, time, date time, or other date time value related to this transport event.
The estimated date, time, date time, or other date time value of the occurrence of this transport event.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value when the arrival of a means of transport at the location of this transport event is estimated to occur.
The indication of whether or not this transport event is or was expected.
The specified period of laycan time during which this transport event occurs.
The indication of whether or not this transport event is a maritime anchorage.
A logistics location where this supply chain event occurs.
A specified period of time during which this supply chain event occurs.
A pilot boarding place, expressed as text, for this transport event.
A geographical feature previously associated with this logistics location.
The code specifying the reason type for this referenced transport event.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value when information related to this transport event was received, from the perspective of the receiver.
An observation related to this transport event.
The route related to this transport event.
The code specifying the type of reported condition for this transport event.
An IOT device for this transport reporting event.
The requested date, time, date time, or other date time value of the occurrence of this transport event.
A requested service related to this transport event.
The date, time, date time or other date time value of the scheduled arrival related to this referenced transport event.
The date, time, date time or other date time value of the scheduled departure related to this referenced transport event.
The scheduled date, time, date time, or other date time value of the occurrence of this transport event.
The scheduled period of time specified for the occurrence of this transport event.
A code specifying a security level for this transport route.
An instruction or a set of instructions specified for this transport event.
A stay specified for this referenced transport event.
The specified period during which the transport means is held at a location.
The measure of a value for this transport event.

referencedBy.comment: An arrival event for this logistics transport movement.
A transport arrival event reported for this logistics status.
A bonded warehouse storage event for this supply chain consignment.
A border crossing event for this logistics transport movement.
A call event for this logistics transport movement.
A consolidation event specifying when and where this piece of logistics transport equipment will be, or has been, stuffed.
A damage event for this logistics transport movement.
A deconsolidation event for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A delay specified for this referenced transport event.
A delivery event for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A departure event during this logistics transport movement.
A transport departure event reported for this logistics status.
A transport devanning event for this referenced supply chain consignment, i.e. the unloading of this consignment at the place of delivery.
An examination event for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
The first arrival event for this logistics transport movement.
An itinerary stop event for this transport route, such as a port call in a vessel schedule.
The loading event during which goods will be or have been loaded into or onto the means of transport used for this logistics transport movement.
A transport loading event reported for this logistics status.
A next delivery event for this transportation waste material.
A pick-up event specifying when and where this piece of logistics transport equipment will be, or has been, collected, i.e. picked-up by the carrier.
A positioning event specifying when and where this piece of logistics transport equipment will be, or has been, positioned, i.e. delivered and available for pick-up.
A previous delivery event for this transportation waste material.
A registration event of this logistics transport means.
A delivery event for this remaining transportation waste material component.
A transport event reported by this monitoring IOT device.
An IOT device reported transport event for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A ship to ship event for this logistics transport movement.
A transport event specified for this logistics transport movement.
A stay specified for this referenced transport event.
A storage event for this supply chain consignment.
An event occurring during the transport of this supply chain consignment.
A transshipment intermediate event during this logistics transport movement.
The unloading event during which goods will be or have been unloaded from the means of transport used for this logistics transport movement.
A transport unloading event reported for this logistics status.
The vanning event (the loading of this consignment at the place of its original despatch) for this referenced supply chain consignment.
A warehouse storage event for this referenced supply chain consignment.
